name: Omllion
overview:
Omllion is a neoteric social media management company, pioneering in providing efficient solutions for social media monitoring, building online reputation, brand protection and social media marketing.

In the era of being omnipresent in the virtual world, we make it easier to track the conversations surrounding you. We are consummated by intricately observing and tracking the conversations across top social media websites where the customers are â€˜talkingâ€™ about our client.

Omllion taps the contemporary marketing strategies proficiently, in sync with the current industry needs by relentlessly monitoring the presence of our clients on the online communication platform.

Omllion features:-

  • Sentiment analysis
  • Watch List
  • Media Distribution
  • Word Population
  • Geo Mapping
  • Engagement
  • Collaborative Working- Assignment, Classifying, etc

Specialties: social media monitoring, marketing, listening and analysis; online reputation, brand protection.
